title: Indian Chapati Bread
ingredients: Â¾ cup hot water or as needed
2 tablespoons olive oil or vegetable oil
method: Step 2: Mix whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, and salt in a large bowl. Use a wooden spoon to stir in water and oil. Mix until a soft, elastic dough forms and add more water, if needed.
Step 3: Knead dough on a lightly floured surface until smooth.
Step 4: Divide dough into 10 equal portions, or less if you want larger chapatis. Roll each piece into a ball and let rest for a few minutes.
Step 5: Heat a lightly greased skillet over medium heat. Use a rolling pin to roll dough balls out on a lightly floured surface until very thin.
Step 6: When the skillet starts to smoke, place a chapati in it. Cook until bottom has brown spots, about 30 seconds, then flip and cook 30 seconds more.
Step 7: Repeat to cook remaining chapatis.
